byline.original: By JOEL PETTERSON and JACK BELL

abstract: Thierry Henry of the Red Bulls was shown a straight red card in the first half of the club's pivotal game at Sporting Kansas City on Saturday afternoon.
snippet: Thierry Henry of the Red Bulls was shown a straight red card in the first half of the club's pivotal game at Sporting Kansas City on Saturday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: KANSAS CITY, Kan. -Thierry Henry is not likely to win the Golden Boot as the top goal scorer in Major League Soccer this season. He might, however, win the Golden Dunce Cap after his straight red card (video below) in the 28th minute of Saturday's critical game against Sporting Kansas City.

headline.main: Red Card for Henry. Disaster for Red Bulls?
